summary: Completed testing of AutoPi√®ces marketplace subcategories and vehicle compatibility features. Backend APIs are fully functional (53/53 tests passed) with all required subcategories and brands. Frontend displays correct data but has dropdown interaction issues preventing full testing of form submissions.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options have overlay interception issues preventing clicks
ui_bugs.error_details: Elements are visible but clicks are intercepted by overlay elements, preventing selection of dropdown options
Registration form submission doesn't redirect to dashboard as expected

passed_tests: Listings API with subcategory filters (pieces and accessoires)
Listings API with compatible brand filter
Listings API with OEM reference filter
Pieces listings page loading with correct subcategory dropdown
Accessoires listings page loading with correct subcategory dropdown
Subcategory dropdowns display correct options (31 pieces types, 25 accessoires types)
Compatible brand filter displays 61 automotive brands
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown overlay interception issues in Select components. The dropdowns are displaying correct data but clicks are being intercepted by overlay elements. This prevents users from selecting subcategories, brands, and other dropdown options. Also investigate registration form submission issue.

success_percentage.frontend: 75% (data loading correctly, but interaction issues with dropdowns)
